SEARCH
Package org.ayushsingh.jdbc_jpa_demo.service

Interface EmployeeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmployeeServiceImpl
public interface EmployeeService
Service interface for managing Employee-related operations. Defines methods for creating, deleting, and updating employees, as well as assigning departments and projects.
Since:
2024-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
